verses.verse: If <S%G1487><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> you have been raised <S%G4891><s%> up with Christ, <S%G5547><s%> keep seeking <S%G2212><s%> the things above, <S%G507><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is, seated <S%G2521><s%> at the right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G1188><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
Set <S%G5426><s%> your mind <S%G5426><s%> on the things above, <S%G507><s%> not on the things that are on earth. <S%G1093><s%>
For you have died <S%G599><s%> and your life <S%G2222><s%> is hidden <S%G2928><s%> with Christ <S%G5547><s%> in God. <S%G2316><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who is our life, <S%G2222><s%> is revealed, <S%G5319><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> will be revealed <S%G5319><s%> with Him in glory. <S%G1391><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> consider <S%G3499><s%> the members <S%G3196><s%> of your earthly <S%G1093><s%> body as dead <S%G3499><s%> to immorality, <S%G4202><s%> impurity, <S%G167><s%> passion, <S%G3806><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> desire, <S%G1939><s%> and greed, <S%G4124><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> amounts <S%G1510><s%> to idolatry. <S%G1495><s%>
For it is on account <S%G1223><s%> of these <S%G3739><s%> things <S%G3739><s%> that the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> will come, <S%G2064><s%>
and in them you also <S%G2532><s%> once <S%G4218><s%> walked, <S%G4043><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> you were living <S%G2198><s%> in them.

But now <S%G3570><s%> you also, <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G659><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%> aside: <S%G659><s%> anger, <S%G3709><s%> wrath, <S%G2372><s%> malice, <S%G2549><s%> slander, <S%G988><s%> [and] abusive <S%G148><s%> speech <S%G148><s%> from your mouth. <S%G4750><s%>
Do not lie <S%G5574><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> since you laid <S%G554><s%> aside <S%G554><s%> the old <S%G3820><s%> self <S%G444><s%> with its [evil] practices, <S%G4234><s%>

and have put <S%G1746><s%> on the new <S%G3501><s%> self <S%G3501><s%> who is being renewed <S%G341><s%> to a true <S%G1922><s%> knowledge <S%G1922><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the image <S%G1504><s%> of the One who created <S%G2936><s%> him

â€“ [a renewal] in which <S%G3699><s%> there is no <S%G3756><s%> [distinction between] Greek <S%G1672><s%> and Jew, <S%G2453><s%> circumcised <S%G4061><s%> and uncircumcised, <S%G203><s%> barbarian, <S%G915><s%> Scythian, <S%G4658><s%> slave <S%G1401><s%> and freeman, <S%G1658><s%> but Christ <S%G5547><s%> is all, <S%G3956><s%> and in all. <S%G3956><s%>

And so, <S%G3767><s%> as those who have been chosen <S%G1588><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and beloved, <S%G25><s%> put <S%G1746><s%> on a heart <S%G4698><s%> of compassion, <S%G3628><s%> kindness, <S%G5544><s%> humility, <S%G5012><s%> gentleness <S%G4240><s%> and patience; <S%G3115><s%>

bearing <S%G430><s%> with one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> and forgiving <S%G5483><s%> each <S%G1438><s%> other, <S%G1438><s%> whoever <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5100><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> a complaint <S%G3437><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> anyone; <S%G5100><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as the Lord <S%G2962><s%> forgave <S%G5483><s%> you, so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> should you.

And beyond <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> [put on] love, <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is the perfect <S%G5047><s%> bond <S%G4886><s%> of unity. <S%G4886><s%>

And let the peace <S%G1515><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> rule <S%G1018><s%> in your hearts, <S%G2588><s%> to which <S%G3739><s%> indeed <S%G2532><s%> you were called <S%G2564><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> body; <S%G4983><s%> and be thankful. <S%G2170><s%>

Let the word <S%G3056><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> richly <S%G4146><s%> dwell <S%G1774><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> you, with all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> and admonishing <S%G3560><s%> one <S%G1438><s%> another <S%G1438><s%> with psalms <S%G5568><s%> [and] hymns <S%G5215><s%> [and] spiritual <S%G4152><s%> songs, <S%G5603><s%> singing <S%G103><s%> with thankfulness <S%G5485><s%> in your hearts <S%G2588><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

And whatever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> in word <S%G3056><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> deed, <S%G2041><s%> [do] all <S%G3956><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> giving <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Him to God <S%G2316><s%> the Father. <S%G3962><s%>
Wives, <S%G1135><s%> be subject <S%G5293><s%> to your husbands, <S%G435><s%> as is fitting <S%G433><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Husbands, <S%G435><s%> love <S%G25><s%> your wives, <S%G1135><s%> and do not be embittered <S%G4087><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> them.
Children, <S%G5043><s%> be obedient <S%G5219><s%> to your parents <S%G1118><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> is well-pleasing to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Fathers, <S%G3962><s%> do not exasperate <S%G2042><s%> your children, <S%G5043><s%> that they may not lose <S%G120><s%> heart. <S%G120><s%>

Slaves, <S%G1401><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who are your masters <S%G2962><s%> on earth, <S%G4561><s%> not with external <S%G3787><s%> service, <S%G3787><s%> as those who <S%G441><s%> [merely] please <S%G441><s%> men, <S%G441><s%> but with sincerity <S%G572><s%> of heart, <S%G2588><s%> fearing <S%G5399><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you do, <S%G4160><s%> do <S%G2038><s%> your work <S%G2038><s%> heartily, <S%G5590><s%> as for the Lord <S%G2962><s%> rather <S%G3756><s%> than <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> for men; <S%G444><s%>

knowing <S%G3609><s%> that from the Lord <S%G2962><s%> you will receive <S%G618><s%> the reward <S%G469><s%> of the inheritance. <S%G2817><s%> It is the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> whom you serve. <S%G1398><s%>

For he who does <S%G91><s%> wrong <S%G91><s%> will receive <S%G2865><s%> the consequences of the wrong <S%G91><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has done, <S%G91><s%> and that without <S%G3756><s%> partiality. <S%G4382><s%>
